comments.en: Toner and drum in one cartridge (18000 pages)

Main differences to the HP LaserJet 4300: Faster, more standard memory, bigger toner cartridge. PostScript Level 3, PCL5, PCL6, HP-GL/2

Up to 45 pages/min. 64/80 MB std, depending on flavour (416 MB max.).

For basic printing functionality use the Postscript PPD. For advanced functionality such as printer status, maintenance features, scanning and photo card unload use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

Optional accessories are duplexer, additional trays up to 1500 sheet, hard drive, extra memory, ethernet adapter, stapler/stacker.
